name: Cave Confectioner
storyline:
You are a cave dweller with a massive appetite. Armed with only your wits, you set out to build a dessert empire. Collect, process, and combine ingredients. Farm crops, discover new recipes, and cook over an open fire. Explore an open world in search of customers for your tasty treats. 
 
Cave Confectioner is a back-to-the-land farming and cooking game. Get to know the locals and sell them every sweet confection you can contrive, and be aware of their individual predilections, like lactose intolerance and love of sugar.
summary: Turn cavemen into consumers with the discovery that shaped an age -- sugar. Farm crops, discover new recipes, and sell baked goods in this back-to-the-land agricultural business simulation.
